DATA SOURCES:

   INE constantly updated data:
	https://ine.es/dynt3/inebase/es/index.htm?padre=517&capsel=525

   Municipality surface area:
	https://ssweb.seap.minhap.es/REL/frontend/inicio/municipios/all/all/50

   (File obtained from later link modified to match INE's naming conventions and pandas read_excel format).
